metadata.creator: Ruben Schade
metadata.description:
10:55 – I found my first attempt at rebooting the Rubénerd Show from January 2013! Topics included time stamp counters, audible tangents, tea, being back in Sydney, and torched coffee shops. Two years later, the show restarted for good with an episode that didn't abruptly end with a door opening.

Recorded in Sydney, Australia. Licence for this track: Creative Commons Attribution 3.0. Attribution: Ruben Schade.

Released February 2016 on Rubénerd and The Overnightscape Underground, an Internet talk radio channel focusing on a freeform monologue style, with diverse and fascinating hosts (this one notwithstanding).

Subscribe with iTunes, Pocket Casts, Overcast or add this feed to your podcast client.

Special thanks to the Internet Archive; their generous hosting makes this show possible.
metadata.subject: audio magazine
metadata.title: Rubénerd Show 325: The long lost 2013 episode
